name: Zhang
greetingText: My best friend, you are wonderful :)
wishText: May the Zenshiro  always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! yaaay! I wish you achieve all your goals
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay,  I hope you liked it
replayText: if you want to watch it again.
